v1.headline: Co-Founder of Nomad V Group | I help B2B founders grow through AI - whether thatâ€™s scaling your LinkedIn presence or transforming how your business operates daily | Lead Gen & AI Strategist
v1.about:
LinkedIn has 1 billion users. 80% of B2B leads happen there.

AI is about to add $15 trillion to the global economy by 2030.

Yet most B2B founders are doing neither right.

Maybe you are in similar position:

You're good at what you do. 
You post on LinkedIn (or not at all)
You have offer.

But you're not getting leads or calls.

Here's what's actually happening:

You're creating content, but nobody knows what you're selling
You don't know who your best buyers are or how to find them
Your DMs feel awkward because you don't have a system.

Founders with great expertise making $8K/month
While others with the same skills make $50K/month using LinkedIn systems

Businesses spending 40 hours on tasks AI could do in 4 hours
Money and time just... disappearing

I've been on both sides.

I quit my job 8 months after starting on LinkedIn. 
By year two, I was making consistent, predictable revenue.

I made every mistake. 
Wasted tons of time. 
Eventually figured out what works.

Now I help other founders skip the trial and error.

âž¤ Two ways we can work together:

1) Done-For-You LinkedIn Lead Generation (Nomad V Group)
My agency builds your entire LinkedIn system so leads come to you.

Here's what we do:

- Figure out your best offer and who actually wants to buy it
- Find your dream clients on LinkedIn and build a list
- Create content that makes people want to work with you
- Warm them up with comments and connections before you reach out
- Send DMs that start conversations and book calls
- Track everything so you know what's working

Result: Qualified calls every month. 

2) AI Strategy & Implementation

- I help you use AI in your actual business operations.
- We look at your current workflows, find where AI fits, and build systems around it.

Result: 
Your team works faster. 
You save 10-20 hours per week. 
Your business runs smoother.

---

LinkedIn and AI aren't going away. 
But every month you wait, the gap gets bigger.

You already know your stuff. 
You just need the right system to turn it into revenue.
If you want help building that system, let's talk.
